alert.note: Alert for Bailey; Hale; Lamb; Lubbock; Lynn (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued March 05 at 11:36AM CST until March 05 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Lubbock
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR THE CENTRAL SOUTH PLAINS... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR THE CENTRAL SOUTH PLAINS... The National Weather Service in Lubbock has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect until 6 PM CST this evening. The National Weather Service in Lubbock has issued a Fire Weather Watch, which is in effect from Sunday afternoon through Sunday evening. The Fire Weather Watch for today has been cancelled. * Wind...For the Red Flag Warning, west around 20 mph at the 20 foot level. For the Fire Weather Watch, west to west-southwest at 20-30 mph at the 20 foot level. * Humidity...8 to 14 percent. * Fuels...Critically dry. * Impacts...Any fires that develop can spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is discouraged.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Monitor later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
